https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9kFHqf8Te8VCVrKq5Phjaddo6U9.jpg The story takes place in a dilapidated building in the blocks of New Belgrade, whose tenants constantly fight and do bad things to one another. In the same building lives a quiet and young married couple, who are completely different from their environment. Bare Ground
